input.issue: Analyze capabilities of Kubernetes resource: ResourceQuota

output:
{
  "capabilities": [
    "namespace-level quota",
    "quota enforcement",
    "aggregate resource limits (hard)",
    "scoped quota (scopes)",
    "selector-based scoping (scopeSelector with Exists/In/NotIn/DoesNotExist)",
    "resource usage tracking (status.used vs status.hard)",
    "metadata labeling and annotations",
    "owner references"
  ],
  "providers": ["kubernetes"],
  "abstractions": ["policy enforcement", "resource governance", "usage monitoring"],
  "complexity": "low",
  "description": "Sets aggregate resource quota restrictions enforced per namespace, with optional scope and selector-based rules. Tracks both configured hard limits and current usage.",
  "useCase": "Limit and monitor resource consumption within a namespace using hard quotas and scoped selectors.",
  "confidence": 0.92
}
